projects.title: Blogs and Websites for Education
projects.bodyText:
- Frontend was build in React 
 - Backend is developed by Experss
 - Easily change data and images.
 - MongoDB used for data progress
 - People can create a new Blog or request to join an learning course.

projects.title: Hosting Server
projects.bodyText:
- This platform focuses on managing and reselling domain names. 
 - It specializes in buying and selling domain names 
 - The site allows users to search for domains, purchase them outright, or set up payment plans
